inputs.label: Ignore Requirements
inputs.tooltip: If true, will ignore all requirements for this event. It may have unintended side effects. If false, if the requirements fail then no event will be triggered.

inputs.label: Force Even If In Discard Pile
inputs.tooltip: This will force run the event even if the event is in the discard pile. Vanilla won't normally run events in the discard pile.

values.viewlabel: and will be forced if in the discard pile

inputs.label: Add to Discard Pile
inputs.tooltip: If true, this will add the event to the discard pile when triggered. If false, it will not add it to the discard pile.

values.viewlabel: and will be added to the discard pile
